dtn.net

Class ALBPSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • dtn.net.ALBPSocket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class ALBPSocket
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    ALBPSocket. It let to send and receive ALBPBundles
    Creation date: 10/04/2019
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Andrea Bisacchi
